    • Constructor Detail

      • BackgroundTerrain

        public BackgroundTerrain(App app,
                         int level,
                         Level levelObj)
        Constructor of BackgroundTerrain.
        Parameters:
        app - is the App object that we will pass through to allow for drawing + more implementations of the PApplet library.
        level - is the level number which a terrain belongs to.
        levelObj - is the Level object which a terrain belongs to.

      • updateTerrain

        public void updateTerrain(int x,
                          float newYCoordinate)
        Update terrain after a projectile explodes.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate where we want to update the terrain at.
        newYCoordinate - is the new y-coordinate of the terrain that will correspond to the x-coordinate.

      • insideExplosion

        public boolean insideExplosion(int x,
                               float explosionCentreX,
                               float explosionCentreY)
        Returns true when the terrain height at a certain x value is inside the explosion circle.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate that corresponds to the terrain height that we want to check.
        explosionCentreX - is the x-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        explosionCentreY - is the y-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        Returns:
        true if terrain height is inside the circle, false if otherwise.

      • aboveExplosion

        public boolean aboveExplosion(int x,
                              float explosionCentreX,
                              float explosionCentreY)
        Returns true if terrain height at a certain x value is above the explosion circle. Use this to see when to collapse the terrain.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate that corresponds to the terrain height that we want to check.
        explosionCentreX - is the x-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        explosionCentreY - is the y-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        Returns:
        true if terrain height is above the circle, false if otherwise.

      • calculateNewY1

        public float calculateNewY1(int x,
                            float explosionCentreX,
                            float explosionCentreY)
        Calculates new y-coordinate for the terrain height at a certain x-coordinate for when the original terrain height is inside the explosion circle.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate that corresponds to the terrain height that we want to generate.
        explosionCentreX - is the x-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        explosionCentreY - is the y-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        Returns:
        new y-coordinate for when the terrain does not fall down, and just creates a crater.

      • calculateNewY2

        public float calculateNewY2(int x,
                            float explosionCentreX,
                            float explosionCentreY)
        Calculates new y-coordinate for the terrain height at a certain x-coordinate for when the original terrain height is above the explosion circle.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate that corresponds to the terrain height that we want to generate.
        explosionCentreX - is the x-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        explosionCentreY - is the y-coordinate of the point where the projectile explodes.
        Returns:
        new y-coordinate for when the terrain falls down.
